name: Jane Angel: Templar Mystery
summary: "Jane Angel: Templar Mystery" is a hidden object, puzzle game. Help Jane fund the answers as she investigates the case of medieval coins contraband. All the clues show that Jane has found the way to discover the Holy Grail hidden by the mysterious Knights Templar. Where could the Holy Grail be found nowadays? Was it brought to Colombia by Columbus under the Red Templar's Cross on his sails? Was it buried under Roslyn Chapel in Scottish Mountains? Are Maltese Knights, Hospitaller considered to be the keepers of the Holy Grail? Join enigmatic adventure!
